nodes.text: A Bayonard Blaster Carry Permit was a type of permit that allowed the bearer to carry a blaster in Bayonard, a platform city that was located on the planet Cularin. They were valid indefinitely.

The permit made its only appearance in Find the Lady, an adventure in the Living Force campaign. In the adventure, the player characters visit Bayonard and on arrival there, any players who declare that they have a blaster are given a blaster carry permit.
